execution_plan.description: Extract active products with their prices from store_main.
execution_plan.query: SELECT products.id AS s1__id, products.name AS s1__name, products.price AS s1__price FROM products WHERE products.is_active = true;

execution_plan.description: Extract active items from store_alt and normalize amount_in_cents to price in dollars.
execution_plan.query: SELECT items.code AS s2__id, items.title AS s2__name, (items.amount_in_cents::numeric / 100.0) AS s2__price FROM items WHERE items.active = 'Y';

execution_plan.description: Combine products and items into a single ranked-by-price list (highest price first). This step performs an application-level union of the two prior result sets and orders by price descending.
execution_plan.query: SELECT $step1.s1__id AS s3__id, $step1.s1__name AS s3__name, $step1.s1__price AS s3__price FROM (SELECT 1) t WHERE $step1.s1__id IS NOT NULL UNION ALL SELECT $step2.s2__id AS s3__id, $step2.s2__name AS s3__name, $step2.s2__price AS s3__price FROM (SELECT 1) t WHERE $step2.s2__id IS NOT NULL ORDER BY s3__price DESC;
